author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Hollywood and auto strikes have workers and unions eager for more gains in 2024
text:
Summary by Ground News 2023 was a historic year for union workers with gains in pay and new contracts. Approval for labor unions hit 67% in 2023 after support fell to an all-time low of 48% in 2009. Researchers believe this trend will continue, lending to a stronger influence among the labor work groups. Share menu More
